trans-unit.source: Obtains the file locations of XML Schema documents for use in populating a Web services discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os locais de arquivos de documentos de esquema XML para uso no preenchimento de um documento de descoberta de serviços da Web.
Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The XmlSchemaSearchPattern class inherits from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoverySearchPattern> class and is employed by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler> class's <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> method, which handles an HTTP request for a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: A classe XmlSchemaSearchPattern herda da <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoverySearchPattern>classe e empregado pelo <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler>da classe <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A>método, que manipula uma solicitação HTTP para um documento de descoberta.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoverySearchPattern>

trans-unit.source: Normally, none of these classes need to be used directly by a developer.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, nenhuma dessas classes precisa ser usada diretamente por um desenvolvedor.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.XmlSchemaSearchPattern"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.XmlSchemaSearchPattern"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference"></xref> object for a given discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference"> </xref> objeto para um documento de descoberta especificado.

trans-unit.source: The concrete <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference> class inherits from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference> class.
A <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference> instance contains the location of the .xsd file.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference>instância contém o local do arquivo. xsd.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference>

trans-unit.source: The file system path of the XML Schema document.
trans-unit.target: O caminho do sistema de arquivo do documento do esquema XML.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference"></xref> object that specifies the file name for an XML Schema document.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference"> </xref> objeto que especifica o nome do arquivo para um documento de esquema XML.

trans-unit.source: Gets the file name pattern to use as a search target.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de nome de arquivo a ser usado como um destino de pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: The pattern "*.xsd" indicates an XML Schema document extension.
trans-unit.target: O padrão "xsd" indica uma extensão de documento de esquema XML.
